tool.name: Categorize by Function

param.name: meta
param.label: Metadata category that describes hierarchy (NOTE: RFAM categories cannot be collapsed).

tool.help:
Run PICRUSt: Categorize by Function ----------------------------------- This module collapses hierarchical data to a specified level for PICRUSt predictions. For instance, often it is useful to examine KEGG results from a higher level within the pathway hierarchy. Many genes are sometimes involved in multiple pathways, and in these circumstances (also know as a one-to-many relationship), the gene is counted for each pathway.
Input file ---------- Output file from the predict process
For more information please visit: ---------------------------------- http://picrust.github.com/
Citation and Contacts --------------------- When using PICRUSt please cite: Predictive functional profiling of microbial communities using 16S rRNA marker gene sequences. Langille, M. Nature Biotechnology, 1-10. 8 2013.
